name: Terminal Decension
description:
Well avoiding the falls during your free fall, you will be tasked with collecting as much gold as possible. The only logical way to do this is grab your favorite type of gun and start shooting everything. Be warned though some miner setup traps to protect their shafts from other miners.

WASD to move
Left mouse to fire
Hold shift to deploy the 1 time use parachute to slow down
